title: FUNCTIONAL SWITCHES
fullText:
In accordance with Clause 2.3.7, functional switches shall be installed in a readily accessible position in the same room, or immediately adjacent to an entrance to the room, in which the room heater or room heaters are located.
A functional switch may beâ€”
(a)	an appliance switch or switches with an 'OFF' position incorporated within the room heater; or
(b)	an isolating switch provided in accordance with Clause 4.9.2(a).
